The Seven Sacred Spiritual Baths Many are those who rise up against me, but you, Holy Spirit, you are my defense. You are close to those who sincerely call upon you, I .. (Say your name) I'm calling to ask you to grant me the following: SUNDAY BATH NO. 1: Remove from me all the wrong that I've done. Blessed be the Lord forever. MONDAY BATH NO. 2: May I always be blessed with a job. Blessed be the Lord always. TUESDAY BATH NO. 3: Always protect me from envy and hatred. Blessed be the Lord always. WEDNESDAY BATH NO. 4: I will always have money to meet my needs. Blessed be the Lord always. THURSDAY BATH NO. 5 By the power of love always obtain happiness. Blessed be the Lord always. FRIDAY BATH NO. 6: Always have peace and tranquility for myself and my home. Blessed be the Lord always. SATURDAY BATH NO. 7: Always protect me from danger and all the evil people that would like to harm me in the future. Blessed be the Lord forever. This prayer is recited only with The Seven Spiritual Sacred Bath Salts. After your daily bath. Dissolve the contents that corresponds to date in a pint of water and bathe from head to toe.
